property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other." Mirri: "After they're done trying to kill us, all right?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits." - Tahli en-Dal, bounty hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses from among the permanents they control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Exalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If dragons excel at anything more than vanity, it is greed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me," Mirri whispered. "I thought you a burden, and you saved my life." Hanna quietly accepted the apology.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true treasure no thief can touch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor forsake roots for the winding of the path, forsake voices for the silence of the mind, forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life." - Orim, Samite healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our belief shall be the lance that pierces Volrath's heart."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback - Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati. "I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die." - Gerrard, to Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Soltari Lancer has first strike as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times of war the victors rarely save their best for last." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Soltari Trooper attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dauthi blood is soltari wine." - Soltari Tales of Life

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth. - Kor requiem

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Reflection tokens on the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Reflection creature token. {0}: Destroy target Reflection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold your position! Leave doubt for the dying!" - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew. - Dal saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive kor people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was probably a lousy spell in the first place." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think that some find sleep a restful state." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two things are needed to survive the harsh skies of Rath: a thick hide and a thicker skull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback - Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath." - Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure. Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. "Glok," he mumbled, and hid.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From its maw comes neither word nor whisper - only wind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitter water, vicious wave; Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze. Home's angry embrace." - Rootwater Saga

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "History is a potent weapon." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Water is life. Or perhaps it is just something to wash it down with.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Discard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) When Thalakos Seer leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see our world when you shut your eyes so tightly that tiny shapes float before them." - Lyna, to Ertai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gone today, here tomorrow." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's do it again!" - Squee, goblin cabin hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the wind will blow the world past if you wait long enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. That creature's controller may sacrifice a permanent for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn. {1}{U}: Return Volrath's Curse to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No home, no heart, no hope." - Stronghold graffito

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I followed her song only to find it was a dirge." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flying like a bird does not make you as free as one." - Volrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orim regarded Gerrard coolly. "You are like the drake," she said, her expression unchanging. "It works hard to maintain its position, but to us it seems to glide along effortlessly. You must do the same."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything around here has cut a deal with gravity." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is the only freedom left to me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax. {B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed." - Lyna, soltari emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dauthi came from beneath the ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light." - Soltari Tales of Life

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They have knives for every soul." - Lyna, soltari emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield with shadow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse - the curse had been fulfilled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ship . . . ," Sisay mumbled. "Intact," Gerrard reassured her, "which is more than I can say for you, my friend." Sisay laughed despite the pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

property.value: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during your end step. As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My enemies' death yields threefold benefit: removal, reuse, and research." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will learn to earn death." - Volrath

property.value: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.value: When Sarcomancy enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Zombies on the battlefield, Sarcomancy deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are called ‘fowl' for a reason." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.value: Flying Discard a creature card: Skyshroud Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it tastes one drop of elvish blood I will cast it from the shroud to see it burn." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The assassin sees only throats and hears only heartbeats.

property.value: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just take a little off the top."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself." - Starke

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every act of destruction has a repercussion." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is high as a mountain and low as a snake? - Dal riddle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!" - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where I come from, stone stays on the ground." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do." - Selenia, dark angel

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!" - Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I - "

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them - as long as you tell them where that is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, that player creates two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to any target of their choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!" - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wrap the flame as twine, Kingdoms will be thine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Renegade Warlord attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most creatures grow out of their baby teeth, but sabertooth wyverns grow into theirs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) {R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to describe something stable as ‘rock solid.' So much for that expression." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Searing Touch deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadowstorm deals 2 damage to each creature with shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds." - Lyna, soltari emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such fuss over machines, Gerrard. Remember that you are the prize of the Legacy. Throw away your toys!" - Orim, Samite healer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A snap of fingers, a snap of teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: It deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target artifact or creature. That permanent's controller gains control of Starke of Rath. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know to whom I owe the most loyalty, and I see him in the mirror every day." - Starke

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I concede it was a cheap shot, but it was the only one I could afford." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Wall of Diffusion can block creatures with shadow as though Wall of Diffusion had shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The injury was being caught between this world and our own; the insult was to find walls within." - Lyna, soltari emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Any player may cast creature spells with mana value 3 or less without paying their mana costs and as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee bounced up and down. "I sees a horsey, an' a piggy, an' a - " "If you don't shut up," hissed Mirri, "you'll see a kidney and a spleeny."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We know our place in the cycle of life - and it is not as flies." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. It is doomed to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Full of beauty and grace, with a predator's instincts . . . Although she wanders, I have always thought Mirri belongs in Llanowar most of all." - Rofellos, Llanowar emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rain is driven like nails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than they do and is their opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. If the first player does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature loses shadow until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how you like it." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. Whenever you play a card, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is two.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is our duty to endure." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves and merfolk have nothing but bitterness for each other. The trolls, however, find them both rather tasty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Create a 1/1 green Spike creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, ‘Alas for the living.'" - Dal myth of the wurm

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. Better to grow broad and heavy. Better that the enemy is crushed beneath its carcass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come, but whether born of harmony or entropy I cannot say." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burl, scurf, and bower Birth fern and flower.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the most sophisticated inventions can survive nature's unsophisticated motivations." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly - they know they cannot be caught.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness. {R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Pay 2 life: Return Selenia, Dark Angel to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me."

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her children are ever part of her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) {0}: The next time Soltari Guerrillas would deal combat damage to an opponent this turn, it deals that damage to target creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
Rules
property.value: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati. "Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a creature card name. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk." - Karn, silver golem

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four, Dunno how to count no more." - Mogg march

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal a card at random from your hand. If that card has the chosen name, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open - but not for long!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship." - Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Telethopter gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After losing several of the devices to midair collisions, Greven forbade moggs from operating telethopters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Thopter Squadron: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery. {1}, Sacrifice another Thopter: Put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Squadron. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. {5}, {T}: Create a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While we fought, the il surrendered." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Untap target attacking creature with shadow. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pine Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Pine Barrens deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Rootwater Depths doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Salt Flats enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Salt Flats deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scabland enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skyshroud Forest enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Skyshroud Forest deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seed of a world's evil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Wasteland: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land promises nothing and keeps its promise." - Oracle en-Vec
